#summary supported internet mime types

= Supported Mime Types =


|| Extensions || Mime types ||
|| .pdf || application/pdf ||
|| .djv, .djvu || image/djvu, image/vnd.djvu, image/x-djvu ||
|| .xps, .oxps || application/vnd.ms-xpsdocument, application/oxps||
|| .cbz || application/x-cbz ||
|| .cbr || application/x-cbr ||
|| .fb2 || application/x-fb2 ||
